Text:
Thanks for this, but instead of uploading the exact same episode of a show you've already uploaded, maybe you could consider uploading the latest episode of Work of Art instead?!

Just a thought! I appreciate that you finally uploaded episode 2 of Work of Art (thank you!), but why wait a week until after it's screened.. again?

Fangular... the re-up was due to probs with the original. Can't you read? If you're so impatient for some other show, learn how to do it yourself. Quit complaining for something you're getting for free you ungrateful CUNT!
